entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
